Description: ****** Scroll down for 55 High Definition images and pictures inside ****** Here's a 2005 Gibson Les Paul Historic '58 Reissue from the Gibson Custom Shop - made for Yamano Music - a pretty rare model. She is in excellent condition and has light playwear. The top is glossy and clean with a few light indents. The back is clean as well with some small indents and light clear coat micro scratches. It has a long neck tenon which extends into the neck pickup cavity. The pickups are Seymour Duncan Antiquities and they sound superb! The frets are in excellent condition and it's set up with low action. It has a medium neck profile and factory Gibson tuners. It has just been deep cleaned and detailed. The front, back and sides were waxed and buffed with a high grade carnuba wax. The frets were polished and the fingerboard was cleaned, buffed and moisturized with an instrument grade lemon oil. It was set up with 10/46's, adjusted and plays very nicely. All the electronics work as they should. Comes with the original Gibson hardshell case, COA and all the paperwork as seen in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 8 % sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
